work_summary: Completed Phase 2A Infrastructure Refactoring Integration - deployed GA4/Facebook Pixel analytics code to freerideinvestor.com and tradingrobotplug.com local WordPress installations, updated analytics functions to use production constants, created remote deployment tool for future use.
decisions_made: Analytics code deployment prioritized for sites with local WordPress installations (freerideinvestor.com, tradingrobotplug.com)
Analytics functions implemented with conditional checks to prevent errors when constants undefined
Real GA4/Pixel IDs used from wp-config-analytics.php configuration files instead of placeholders
Remote deployment tool created for future SFTP/SSH deployments to sites without local installations
tradeoffs: Local deployment completed immediately for available sites, remote deployment coordination required for remaining sites
Analytics code includes conditional checks for graceful degradation when constants not defined
Deployment tool created for future use but current credentials not available for immediate remote deployment
